summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Myers Way, from 1st Avenue South to Barton Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9439 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
